name: Tihdy Pong
description:
Why stop at creating your own engine when you can create your own programming language?

The controls are W and S for the left paddle and I and K for the right paddle. They are sadly not configurable without modifying the Rust source (but instructions can be found in the source tree on how to build/compile).

As usual, we had no gameplay until Sunday. Speaking of gameplay, balancing took about 20 minutes. That's what happens when you steal someone else's idea take inspiration from the classics.
